concept.title: 5109.103 Policy.

conbody.p: (b) Army contracting officials shall use the Determination of Responsibility Assistant (DORA) Contractor Responsibility bot to assist them to determine prospective contractor responsibility or non-responsibility. Instructions on how to use the bot can be found on the Acquisition Innovation through Technology page located at: https://procurement.army.mil/botand at AFARS PGI 5109.103(b)-1..
